outline:
1. to restrain, retain, close up, shut, withhold, refrain, stay, detain
    1. (Qal)
      1. to restrain, halt, stop
      2. to retain
    2. (Niphal) to be restrained, be stayed, be under restraint
kjv_def: [idiom] be able, close up, detain, fast, keep (self close, still), prevail, recover, refrain, [idiom] reign, restrain, retain, shut (up), slack, stay, stop, withhold (self).
strongs_def: to inclose; by analogy, to hold back; also to maintain, rule, assemble
